resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Architecture naval from French Britanny : this boat is also a Sinagot. But, the yacht has only rigged a mainsail and a jib on a small bowsprit, as she is venturing out to sea, far from the coast. Traditionally, this small boat does not leave the open sea. This type of boat is on display at the Musée de la Marine in Douarnenez. <a title="Port-Musée de Douarnenez." href="https://www.port-musee.org/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://www.port-musee.org/
resource.chars:
Architecture naval from French Britanny : this boat is also a Sinagot. But, the yacht has only rigged a mainsail and a jib on a small bowsprit, as she is venturing out to sea, far from the coast. Traditionally, this small boat does not leave the open sea.
This type of boat is on display at the Musée de la Marine in Douarnenez. https://www.port-musee.org/
